User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:8.0a2) Gecko/20110927 Firefox/8.0a2
Build ID: 20110927042012

Steps to reproduce:

I was tryed upload 4.5mb++ file to mediafire.com


Actual results:

"File upload failed due to a networks timeout. Please retry upload.

Depending on your browser, this may have been caused by attempting to upload a folder. Folder uploads are not permitted"
So i can't upload any file to "mediafire"
(I am using Windows 7 ultime x64, Aurora 8.0a2(2011-09-27) and Shockwave Flash 10.3.183.7)


Expected results:

Should file uploaded, not broke
